message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $10,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $9,500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is really the lowest I can go. It's a very competitive price for this product.
